products.title: Glide Peptide SPF50 PA+++ Lip Treatment
products.description1: Treat your lips with a juicy burst of colour, glossy shine and ultra hydrating care!
products.description2: Our SUGAR Glide Peptide SPF50 PA+++ Lip Treatment gives you dramatically soft, plump and hydrated lips with its power-packed cocktail blend boosted with Peptides, Hyaluronic acid and the goodness of 8 Botanical Oils. The sheer yet buildable formula adds an intensely glossy finish, locks in moisture and repairs dry, chapped lips. Use as needed throughout the day and as an overnight lip mask.
products.description3: This product is vegan, mineral-oil free, paraben-free, sulphate-free and cruelty-free.
products.howtouse1: Use as needed throughout the day to keep your lips soft and hydrated. For deep hydration and repair, apply as an overnight lip mask.

products.title: Cloud Nine Niacinamide Glow Blush
products.description1: With a gorgeous pop of colour and a radiant glowing finish, our new liquid blush will have you walking on cloud nine!
products.description2: Meet Cloud Nine Niacinamide Glow Blush with a skin-care-infused nourishing formula that blends seamlessly to give you dewy, flushed cheeks in one swipe. This liquid blush with a serum-like texture has a blend of 8 botanical oils along with skin-loving ingredients like niacinamide, kojic acid, and amla extracts to brighten, hydrate and care for your skin. Create your custom dewy blush look with this buildable, super-pigmented formula that layers and blends without streaking. Just a few dots are all you need to uplift your complexion with a radiant wash of colour.
products.description3: Choose from playful shades from a bright peachy pink to a flirty raspberry, that flatter all Indian skin tones.
products.howtouse1: Apply a dot of Glow Blush to the high points of your cheeks, blending with your fingers, and build up the colour as needed to intensify. For a sun-kissed look, add a bit to the nose.
products.howtouse2: For lips & eyes, glide evenly on lips and eyes, adding layers as desired.
products.howtouse3: Pro tip: A little goes a long way with this foundation!
products.genericName: Cloud Nine Niacinamide Glow BlushItem Dimensions: 55mm x 35mm x 135mm

products.title: Glide Peptide Serum Lipstick
products.description1: Introducing our revolutionary serum-infused lipstick that delivers intense colour, lasting hydration and unparalleled care. Formulated with soft powder pigments, Glide Peptide Serum Lipstick glides on with ease and revitalises lips with a supreme velvety matte finish.
products.description2: Indulge your lips in an airy light and lush formula that is super nourishing and protects your lips thanks to a blend of Peptides, Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane and Bakuchiol. The formula combines ultimate comfort and vibrant colour in one stroke, ensuring your lips look and feel their best!
products.description3: A masterpiece of sophisticated beauty and elegance, this lipstick showcases a stunning SUGAR monogram.
products.howtouse1: Apply starting in the centre of your upper lip. Work from the centre to the outer edges of your lips, following the contour of your mouth. Then glide across the entire bottom lip.
products.genericName: Glide Peptide Serum Lipstick Dimensions: 55mm x 35mm x 135mm
